title: Quartered Safe Out Here
description:
10 X 15 mins

The late George MacDonald Fraser is best known as the author of the wonderful "Flashman" novels, as well as a scriptwriter of some renown.

As a young man in WW2 however, he was posted to Burma. His memories of the Burma campaign (in which my own father fought) are at times both funny and frightening. Read by the author, they are a must for anybody interested in WW2 or a fan of Flashman's dark humour.
